Chapter 2255 - Chapter 2255: Five Weirdos On The Crane Pavilion Mountain, Half A Life Of Evil Affinity (1)

Chapter 2255: Five Weirdos on the Crane Pavilion Mountain, Half a Life of Evil Affinity (1)

Translator: Nyoi-Bo Studio Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

Wait…

What was that?

Lord Shou again?

Bazhun’an’s trump card is me again?

Xu Xiaoshou almost spat out a mouthful of blood. He stood stock still as his face turned purple. In the end, he turned around and left with his fan.

“You guys have fun, I won’t be with you.”

“Hey, don’t!” Aunt Xiang hurriedly stood up. “Don’t you want your ‘peerless genius’?”

“As long as I don’t get involved, why do I need so many people? The First Pavilion in the Sky’s configuration is already sufficient.”

“What about your Master? Have you made all the preparations for the attack on the Saint Mountain?”

There was a click.

Xu Xiaoshou had grabbed the door handle, but he stopped in his tracks.

This door weighed a ton and even the ‘Strengthen’ move in his sacred physique could not push it open for a moment.

It had to be said that Aunt Xiang’s words struck a chord in Xu Xiaoshou’s heart.

In the past, he said, “When I ascend to the Sovereign Stage, I would dare to carry my sword to the Saint Mountain.” Now, it seemed like a joke!

It was far from enough to rely on the strength of only one person.

The Holy Divine Palace was too huge. Even Bazhun’an needed outside help before he dared to sound the horn to attack.

Even if he used all his passive skills, ignited his state and expanded to his utmost limit and had the ability to kill a demi-saint… he was not a demi-saint at the Ten High Nobles level. He would be like Jiang Buyi.

What about the rest?

If the five Saint Holy Emperor aristocratic family were to take action, there would be at least five Holy Emperors on the forefront, right?

The Council of Ten could easily gather ten demi-saints who were far more powerful than Jiang Buyi.

They had the support of the Demi-Saint families who had always stood on the side of the Holy Divine Palace. Even if the quality was like that of Jiang Buyi’s, the quantity was enough.

The Third Ancestor of the White Vein, the Demonic Emperor Black Dragon, and Feng Yujin barely made up five Holy Emperor cards.

The five crippled Holy Emperors were all in poor condition, so even if they were rounded up, they could still fight against the enemy Holy Emperors.

The remaining ‘Jiang Buyis’ from the Holy Divine Palace would be left to Mei Siren, Yu MO, and the other top people’s combat strength to digest. It would be a one-on-ten battle.

Even if Bazhun’an converted himself into a Holy Emperor, but he couldn’t just enter the battle so easily. He had to watch for the variables on the other side, right?

Otherwise, wouldn’t he become like Dao Qiongcang who could be manipulated by anyone on Abyss Island?

Was this enough?

It was still not enough, far from enough!

No matter what, Xu Xiaoshou couldn’t gather enough super combat strength to launch a general attack and kill his way up to the Saint Mountain.

The Sacred Mountain Gui Zhe that loomed over the Jade Capital City , was so small and yet so huge.

As long as one looked at it, little by little, one would be crushed.

However, perhaps this Qilin could take it down. It could add some weight to the delicate balance of the scales on their side so it would tilt slightly…

Xu Xiaoshou turned around and said seriously, “Let’s talk about the details. It’s too easy to run into problems if there are only castles in the air.”

Aunt Xiang’s worried look turned into a smile. She immediately understood how important Sleeveless was to this young man.

“It’s good that you’re willing to talk, but don’t feel too pressured.”

“Bazhun’an and Water Ghost were full of praise for you. They said that you completed at least half of the mission that should have been Water Ghost’s mission on Abyss Island.”

“When you completed that, the Four Divine Pillars had not been opened yet.

You had to rely on your own abilities.”

Aunt Xiang patted her ample bosom and declared solemnly.

“Perhaps to you, you feel that Bazhun’an believed in you and addressed you as Lord Shou because he wanted to tease you.”

“But I’ve known him for so long, and I’ve never heard him praise anyone like this, even if it was only a joke… Oh, except for The Divine.”

After a pause, Aunt Xiang shook her head and corrected herself. “No, I should say that he never joked around, even if it sounded like it.”

“+(Flattered, Passive Points),+l.”

Xu Xiaoshou was about to smile and reply with a ‘Really?’. However, he saw the Information Bar and felt like he had been doused with cold water and quickly woke up.

“Stop your flattery.” He returned to the table, sat down and poured himself a glass of wine. “When exactly will we take action?”

“I can do it anytime in the next few days.” Aunt Xiang was clearly well-prepared. “What about you?”

“I can’t. I still need to make preparations.”

Xu Xiaoshou had just received the Heavenly Ancestor Legacy and was rushed to the Yougui Pavilion.

As a result, he had yet to digest the many spoils of war he had obtained after the battle on Abyss Island.

The Holy Medicine from the Forest of Miracles, Dragon Apricot, Dragon Blood, the treasures, people, insights, and even the largest value of the Passive Points…

He had not used any of it yet!

What he needed now was a small enclosed space.

Before he entered, he was Xu Xiaoshou. After he came out, he could become Xu the Beast and his combat strength would be more than double in the ancient book.

“Then I’ll give you some time to prepare. By the way, do you need any outlet to help you to vent?” Aunt Xiang asked.

“Vent?”

“For example, Ah Yao.”

. There’s no need for that!”

“Oh, so it wasn’t that kind of preparation.” Aunt Xiang looked pensive as she stared at the slightly embarrassed sickly young master. She smiled and said.

“I won’t tease you anymore. I’ve already invited the people from the First

Pavilion in the Sky for you. You don’t have to think too much about it.”

“In a few days, they will enter the city, one after another. At that time, they will meet you in secret. You can tell me who you need.”

“You’ve been in danger recently. Be careful, even if you’re good at disguising yourself. ”

Xu Xiaoshou was surprised. You even invited my people in advance. You’ve really gone all out for the preparations!

“Thank you.”

“You’re welcome. You’re Lord Shou now, the second-in-command saint servant. Your status is even higher than mine, someone who is not a Saint Servant. It’s my duty to take care of these trivial matters for you. I’m doing it for your convenience.”

“Alright, that’s it. You don’t have to think about the operation. I’ll plan it. Elder Dao the Flamboyant had been very busy recently. Perhaps the worst-case scenario we expected would not happen. Tell me when you’re ready..”
